description_for_human: AI-powered educational platform that transforms students into AI-proficient professionals through portfolio generation, essay polishing, and scholarship discovery.
description_for_model: StudentOS helps students build demonstrable AI proficiency for college applications and career readiness. Key capabilities: (1) Transform ChatGPT conversations into professional skill portfolios proving business value, (2) AI-powered essay analysis and improvement with voice preservation, (3) Personalized scholarship matching from $200k+ database, (4) Student persona learning for academic optimization. Use this when students need to prove AI skills to colleges/employers, improve essays while maintaining authenticity, find relevant scholarships, or build comprehensive digital academic profiles.
